TEAMS_SETTINGS.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Teams

Round up the troops! Teams are a great way to organize your agents based on their roles and responsibilities.
Your agents can be part of multiple teams. You can assign conversations to a team when you are working collaboratively.

You can manage your existing teams from this page or make new ones using the 'Add team' button.

Open the Teams handbook in another tab for a helping hand.

LIST.404: There are no teams created in your account.

CREATE.TITLE: Create a new team
CREATE.DESC: Provide basic details for your new team.

AGENTS.TITLE: Add agents to team - %{teamName}
AGENTS.DESC: Add Agents to your newly created team. This lets you collaborate as a team on conversations, get notified on new events in the same conversation.

WIZARD.title: Create
WIZARD.body: Create a new team of agents.

WIZARD.title: Finish
WIZARD.body: You are all set to go!

CREATE.TITLE: Edit your team's details
CREATE.DESC: Provide a new title and description for your team.

AGENTS.TITLE: Edit agents to team - %{teamName}
AGENTS.DESC: Edit Agents to your newly created team. All the added agents will be notified when a conversation is assigned to this team.

WIZARD.title: Team details
WIZARD.body: Change name, description and other details.

WIZARD.title: Finish
WIZARD.body: You are all set to go!

TEAM_FORM.ERROR_MESSAGE: Couldn't save the team details. Please try again.

ADD.TITLE: Add agents to team - %{teamName}
ADD.DESC: Add Agents to your newly created team. This lets you collaborate as a team on conversations, get notified on new events in the same conversation.

FINISH.TITLE: Your team is ready!
FINISH.MESSAGE: You can now collaborate as a team on conversations. Happy supporting!

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not delete the team. Please try again.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Are you sure want to delete - %{teamName}
CONFIRM.MESSAGE: Deleting the team will remove the team assignment from the conversations assigned to this team.

AUTO_ASSIGN.LABEL: Allow auto assign for this team.
